nodes.body: {📅 events} [Tiny Teams](https://www.yogscast.games/tinyteams) is back and accepting submissions for this year's festival happening August 8th - 14th!

{🎼 music} The [Serafina's Saga: Awakened](https://g.co/kgs/H8FJwCX) soundtrack is now available to listen to on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/album/38vhtiY9YadrRZvLbEgAii?si=QVUVvPotSkacW6aY3pDE2g&nd=1&dlsi=04dd0c3fc4254a0a)!

{🏆 awards} [The Escape Artist](https://paradowski.com/stories/escape-artist-out-now) by [Paradowski Creative](http://www.paradowski.com/) won a Webby! They were the [People's Voice Winner for AI, Metaverse & Virtual Best Narrative Experience](https://winners.webbyawards.com/2024/ai-metaverse-virtual/metaverse-immersive-features/best-narrative-experience/285660/the-escape-artist)!

{🫙 game jams} [HaxeJam 2024: Summer Jam](https://itch.io/jam/haxejam-2024-summer-jam) is <time dateTime="2024-06-09">June 9th</time> through <time dateTime="2024-06-15">June 15th</time>! Make a game with [Haxe](https://haxe.org/) in this week-long Jam!
{!header} There's only been a slow trickle of news in our community, lately. If you have anything to share, please add it to the next issue!
